awards.summary: As part of the Lane Tech Math Team, myself (and fellow juniors) placed at ICTM state, the Illinois state math contest. I led the team with the highest score of 34/40.
awards.title: ICTM State Algebra 2 Team - 8th Place

awards.summary: As part of the Lane Tech Math Team, myself (and fellow juniors) placed at CCML contest 5, the City of Chicago Math League.
awards.title: CCML Algebra 2 Team, Contest 5 - 3rd Place
